item.title: Week 3: Data Manipulation with dplyr
item.description: About tidyverse About dplyr Pipe Operator Select Slice Filter Mutate About tidyverse There are thousands of packages developed by even greater number of developers that provide new features or improve Râ€™s features. One of the most influential and beneficial set of packages is tidyverse which is a collection of other packages for data manipulation, exploration and visualization. All tidyverse packages share an underlying design philosophy, grammar, and data structures.

item.title: Week 2: On Data Frames and Intro to ggplot2 For Making Graphs
item.description: Data Frames Data Frame Index Create New Column/Variable Inspect Data Frames Basic Graphs with ggplot2 Components of ggplot2 Graphs Types of Plots With ggplot2 Apply a Different Theme Data Frames Data frames are the most widely used data object in R. A data frame is a collection of vectors of the same length, which is also called columns. Each column have their own data type (e.
